member.name: T:WeatherDataAnalysis.App
member.summary: Provides application-specific behavior to supplement the default Application class.

member.name: M:WeatherDataAnalysis.App.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the singleton application object. This is the first line of authored code executed, and as such is the logical equivalent of main() or WinMain().

member.name: M:WeatherDataAnalysis.App.OnLaunched(Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used such as when the application is launched to open a specific file.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: M:WeatherDataAnalysis.App.onNavigationFailed(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when Navigation to a certain page fails

member.name: M:WeatherDataAnalysis.App.onSuspending(System.Object,Windows.ApplicationModel.SuspendingEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when application execution is being suspended. Application state is saved without knowing whether the application will be terminated or resumed with the contents of memory still intact.
member.param: The source of the suspend request.
